job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an Apache CloudStack developer at CLouDINfra you help build the infrastructure behind the many hundreds of thousands of websites hosted within Total Webhosting Solutions.

   Apache CloudStack is a cloud orchestrator that we use within CLDIN to deploy and run our tens of thousands of virtual machines.

   You contribute to this Open Source project on a daily basis, where you become part of the community.

   For CLDIN, you improve CloudStack by fixing bugs, adding features, but also supporting the operational engineering team with your knowledge of the code when using CloudStack.

   Terms such as Gitlab, Ubuntu, KVM, Java, Maven, JNA and JSVC are not unknown to you or you are willing to invest in this knowledge.

   Ultimately, you help ensure that the hundreds of thousands of Yourhosting, Versio and Savvii websites are online 24/7!

   We are looking for an enthusiastic and flexible software developer who enjoys building Open Source software that is used within a company.

   You find it a challenge to find out where mistakes are and don't mind having to dive deep until a problem is solved.
job_details.full_text:
Apache CloudStack (Java/Python) developer

As an Apache CloudStack developer at CLouDINfra you help build the infrastructure behind the many hundreds of thousands of websites hosted within Total Webhosting Solutions.

   Apache CloudStack is a cloud orchestrator that we use within CLDIN to deploy and run our tens of thousands of virtual machines.

   You contribute to this Open Source project on a daily basis, where you become part of the community.

   For CLDIN, you improve CloudStack by fixing bugs, adding features, but also supporting the operational engineering team with your knowledge of the code when using CloudStack.

   Terms such as Gitlab, Ubuntu, KVM, Java, Maven, JNA and JSVC are not unknown to you or you are willing to invest in this knowledge.

   Ultimately, you help ensure that the hundreds of thousands of Yourhosting, Versio and Savvii websites are online 24/7!

   We are looking for an enthusiastic and flexible software developer who enjoys building Open Source software that is used within a company.

   You find it a challenge to find out where mistakes are and don't mind having to dive deep until a problem is solved.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on developing and maintaining the Apache CloudStack orchestrator, which is a cloud infrastructure tool. While it involves software development and operational support, it does not align with the core responsibilities or technologies of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer as defined in the coding book. The role is primarily traditional software engineering within an infrastructure context, making it fall under the 'Ambiguous' category due to its lack of focus on AI/ML model development or deployment.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly mentions 'software developer', 'fixing bugs', and 'adding features' to the Apache CloudStack project, which are core software development activities.
The role involves contributing to an open-source project by fixing bugs and adding new functionalities.
The role requires supporting the operational engineering team with knowledge of the code when using CloudStack, indicating involvement in the operational aspects of the system.
job_tasks.phrase: supporting the operational engineering team with your knowledge of the code

job_tasks.justification: While not directly AI/ML modeling, the role involves working with a 'cloud orchestrator' which manages virtual machines, implying a level of system configuration and management that could be broadly interpreted as modeling infrastructure, though it's not the primary focus.
The role's contribution directly impacts the hosting of hundreds of thousands of websites, indicating an understanding of the business's core operations and the importance of system uptime.
job_tasks.phrase: help build the infrastructure behind the many hundreds of thousands of websites hosted within Total Webhosting Solutions

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions deploying and running virtual machines, which involves configuring and managing resources, a form of system modeling.
job_tasks.phrase: deploy and run our tens of thousands of virtual machines

soft_skills.phrase: find out where mistakes are and don't mind having to dive deep until a problem is solved
willing to invest in this knowledge
